name: Gluten-Free Chex® Mix with Cinnamon and Pumpkin Spice
author: tcasa
summary: A fall gluten-free pumpkin spice Chex® mix. Feel free to add what you want to make it your own.
ingredients: 4 cups gluten-free crispy corn cereal squares (such as gluten-free Corn Chex®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Place butter into a small microwave-safe bowl and cover bowl with waxed paper
Melt in the microwave for about 40 seconds
Combine cinnamon, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, and salt in a small bowl
Combine cereal squares, peanuts, and pumpkin seeds in a large bowl
Add butter-spice mixture and blend until well coated
Spread mixture onto prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 to 20 minutes
Remove from oven and allow to cool
Transfer to a bowl and mix in milk chocolate chips and raisins
